entry.title: 5 Pack | 22" x 78" Mauve DIY Premium Designer Chiffon Chair Sashes
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 8.99

[About]

  • Quantity:Â 5 Sashes
  • Material:Â Chiffon
  • Color:Â Mauve
  • Size:Â 22" wide x 78" long
  • All sizes are approximate measurements
  • Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
  • Buy Sash Buckles

[Information]

Our soft Chiffon Sashes are perhaps one of our most exquisite sash options! Sheer soft flowing feel and lightweight luxurious look of this sash adds the perfect delicate elegance touch to any event! Made from premium quality chiffon, the dreamlike draping effect of these sashes will transform your simple party chairs into royal seats. Besides having seamless stylish appearance, these sashes are also durable enough to continue accentuating your party chairs for many years with the same flawless flair.

Easy to shape and work with, chiffon fabric gives plenty of options to adorn your party or banquet chairs; pair with our Satin or Spandex Chair Belts and Covers, embellish with our Jeweled Sash Clips and Pins, or add our Sash Flowers for a refreshing feel. If you wish to make your event simply outshine all the rest, we recommend our favorite âweavedâ style that can be created by interlacing multiple chiffon sashes on a Chiavari chair!

Additional Information:

  • Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, Don't use dryer
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations
  • Uses:Â Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Â 

Soft, Smooth, and Silky

Premium quality chiffon fabric is stylishly fashioned in classy curly style to craft these pretty sashes. The soft, smooth, and silky chiffon material coupled with chic curly design will instantly heighten the elegance of your plain and lackluster banquet or wedding chairs. Pair these appealing beauties with matching color chair covers and caps to create a charismatic coherence, or create a perfectly contrastive festive mood by coordinating these with vibrant hued satin or polyester chair covers.

Premium Chiffon Fabric

Like a majestic flow of a paradise fountain, these gorgeous chiffon sashes also cascade gorgeously, creating a totally dramatic and exotic appearance for your guests to behold and marvel at. Premium quality chiffon fabric is stylishly fashioned in classy curly style to craft these pretty sashes.

Multi-Use

The soft, smooth, and silky chiffon material coupled with chic curly design will instantly heighten the elegance of your plain and lackluster banquet or wedding chairs. entry.title: 6FT | Mauve Premium Chiffon Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 3.99 - 687.70 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Runner
Material: High Quality Chiffon Fabric
Color: Mauve
Length: 6 FT
Width: 1.8 FT
Seamless: Yes
Edges are Serged
Flows and Folds Without Creases.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Spread these Chiffon Table runners charmingly atop your colorful or plain table covers to add a dreamy aspect to your tablescape. It can give a softer feel to a rustic wood table top or can be themed with some plain linen to create a change in texture. Gather it as much or as little as you want or tie it off with ribbon to create beautiful folds.

    Pair these with botanicals, taper candleholders, compote bowls, candle holders, delicate florals, geometric terrariums, agate ideas, candlestick holders, candelabras for a chic wedding look. These runners can be used on your guest tables or to enhance side tables at your venue. Place over wooden entrance tables or your guest book table for that extra special touch.

    Additional Information:
    • How to Care:Â Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
    • For Table Runner only, does not include any other decorations
    • Uses:Â Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

  • Each combo includes one Curly Willow Sash and one Designer Chiffon Sash

[Information]

Better just got BEST! Yes, our special combo pack of premium quality soft flowing designer chiffon sashes and chic curly chiffon sashes will impart that contemporary elegance to your party and banquet chairs that no one has beheld before! Perfect for Chiavari Chairs, Banquet Chairs, Folding Chairs, and Party Chairs, this dazzling duo will create an eye-catching chair accent. Let this classy pair transform your plain and drab party chairs into royal seats of cascading beauty. Use in conjunction with our Chiffon Chair Covers, Tablecloths, Table Runners, Backdrop Drapes, and Roof Panels to complete your partyâs royal look!

entry.title: 6FT | Terracotta Premium Chiffon Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2140
Type: Runners
Price: 3.99 - 687.70 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Runner
Material: High Quality Chiffon Fabric
Color: Terracotta
Length: 6 FT
Width: 1.8 FT
Seamless: Yes
Edges are Serged
Flows and Folds Without Creases.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Spread these Chiffon Table runners charmingly atop your colorful or plain table covers to add a dreamy aspect to your tablescape. It can give a softer feel to a rustic wood table top or can be themed with some plain linen to create a change in texture. Gather it as much or as little as you want or tie it off with ribbon to create beautiful folds.

    Pair these with botanicals, taper candleholders, compote bowls, candle holders, delicate florals, geometric terrariums, agate ideas, candlestick holders, candelabras for a chic wedding look. These runners can be used on your guest tables or to enhance side tables at your venue. Place over wooden entrance tables or your guest book table for that extra special touch.

    Additional Information:
    • How to Care:Â Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
    • For Table Runner only, does not include any other decorations
    • Uses:Â Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration
